articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: China Puts J-10 Combat Jet Into Action; PLAAF Fighter Accused Of Attacking Aussie Chopper With Flares - EurAsian Times
articles.description: In yet another incident of Chinese belligerence, PLA Air Force’s ‘indigenous’ J-10 combat jet was involved in firing flares at an Australian Navy helicopter.  The Australian government accused a Chinese fighter jet of firing flares dangerously near an Austral…
articles.content:
In yet another incident of Chinese belligerence, PLA Air Force’s ‘indigenous’ J-10 combat jet was involved in firing flares at an Australian Navy helicopter.
